indications:
Indications 
(From 6.1.2.3 Other antidiabetic drugs: British National Formulary)
6.1.2.3 Other antidiabetic drugs
name: LINAGLIPTIN
side-effects: Side-effects cough, nasopharyngitis; also reported pancreatitis
doses:
adult over 18 years, 5 mg
once daily

Dose of concomitant sulfonylurea
may need to be reduced
